[Control.IsVisible(52) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows)] + [!Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Landscape.Logo) | IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))]] | [Control.IsVisible(52) + Container.Content(episodes) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Landscape.FloorInfo.episodes)] | [Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.FloorInfo.movies) + [!Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.Logo) | IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))]] | [Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.Content(tvshows) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.FloorInfo.tvshows) + [!Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.Logo) | IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))]] | [Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.Content(seasons) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.FloorInfo.seasons)] | [Control.IsVisible(503) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.FloorInfo.movies) + [!Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.Logo) | IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))]] | [Control.IsVisible(503) + Container.Content(tvshows) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.FloorInfo.tvshows) + !Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.Logo)] | [Control.IsVisible(503) + Container.Content(season) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.FloorInfo.seasons)]

[Control.IsVisible(52) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows)] + [!Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Landscape.Logo)]] | [Control.IsVisible(52) + Container.Content(episodes) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Landscape.FloorInfo.episodes)] | [Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.FloorInfo.movies) + [!Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.Logo)]] | [Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.Content(tvshows) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.FloorInfo.tvshows) + [!Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.Logo)]] | [Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.Content(seasons) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ShowCase.FloorInfo.seasons)] | [Control.IsVisible(503) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.FloorInfo.movies) + [!Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.Logo)]] | [Control.IsVisible(503) + Container.Content(tvshows) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.FloorInfo.tvshows) + !Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.Logo)] | [Control.IsVisible(503) + Container.Content(season) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Wall.FloorInfo.seasons)]

[Control.IsVisible(52) + Container.Content(movies) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(52.Movies.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(52) + Container.Content(tvshows) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(52.TV.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(52) + Container.Content(episodes) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(52.Episodes.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.Content(movies) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(53.Movies.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.Content(tvshows) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(53.TV.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.Content(seasons) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(53.Seasons.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(59) + Container.Content(movies) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(59.Movies.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(59) + Container.Content(tvshows) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(59.TV.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(503) + Container.Content(movies) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(503.Movies.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(503) + Container.Content(tvshows) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(503.TV.MediaflagsLayout))] | [Control.IsVisible(503) + Container.Content(seasons) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(503.Seasons.MediaflagsLayout))]
